name: pir_motion_detection_autoplay
description: Continue playing or start a playlist when someone enters the room. Needs a common PIR (passive infrared) motion sensor board connected to GPIO. The delay adjustment knob must be on a low setting < 10 seconds. Additionally, a hardware switch to activate/deactivate motion detection and a status LED can be connected (with suitable resistors).
